DOC.brief_summary: Our goal is to demonstrate the feasibility of laying uncomplicated ultrasound-guided central subclavian catheter by supraclavicular route in the newborn.
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility and Safety of Ultrasound Guided Installation Central Subclavian Catheter Through Supraclavicular Way
DOC.criteria: Patient hospitalized in the neonatal intensive care or neonatal intensive care at the University Hospital of Hautepierre All infants less than 44 weeks corrected age who require a surgical approach In the first line if neonate over 34 weeks corrected age requiring dual carriageway catheter After Failure or inability laying KTEC for children between 30 and 34 weeks of age corrected and heavy over 1000 Nouveauné de poids < 1000g Nouveauné de moins de 30 semaines d'âge corrigé Choix d'une autre voie d'abord plus judicieux (KTVO, KTC broviac) Sortie avant retrait du KTC
